name: Shop Overview Report
report_script:
def execute(filters=None):
    columns = [
        {"fieldname": "shop_number", "label": _("Shop Number"), "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
        {"fieldname": "shop_name", "label": _("Shop Name"), "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 200},
        {"fieldname": "status", "label": _("Status"), "fieldtype": "Select", "options": "\nOccupied\nAvailable", "width": 100},
    ]

    data = get_shop_data(filters)
    return columns, data

def get_shop_data(filters):
    shops = frappe.get_all('Shop', fields=['shop_number', 'name as shop_name', 'status'])
    return shops
